TopicTitle: I don't know where else to put this, but where can I find my notifications and private messages on mobile?

Articles.Content: Title pretty much says it.  All I can find that's closest to that is unread threads, which don't show private messages.

The upper right icon (same place you log in at. . .looks like three horizontal lines in a stack) pops open a window on my chrome/android device. That window has a bell and an envelope at the very top for notifications and messages. You have to be logged in to see them.
